Young man witnesses very bright "star" flying north very fast, "1/2 speed of falling star."  Obj. stopped, suddenly disappeared.

Telephoned Report:Man, wife, and four neighbors witnessed a reddish, orange, and white ball of light for five minutes.  When it flew directly over them, they saw white light on the bottom of the craft.((NUFORC Note:  We spoke with these witnesses, and we found them to be credible in what they described.  PD))
Man reports seeing object in sky "with lights going around it."  (Facts incomplete and unclear.)
Man repts. strange green glow, which lit up sky and moved dramatically across sky.  Witnessed 3, then 4 objs. Strobed effect.

Telephoned Report: Mother, daughter, friend witness huge, lighted ball streak overhead.  "Turned whole sky blue."  Flew N to S.  Size of full moon.  Sighting lasted only 5-10 seconds.  One of many reports to NUFORC on this time and date. Multiple reports of apparently the same object over Ontario, Canada, which was photographed by a television news team east of Windsor.  Very dramatic event.((NUFORC Note:  We spoke with the daughter via telephone, and she sounded very credible to us.  She reported that the event was quite dramatic.  Moreover, as it passed overhead, the group of witnesses hear a sudden, muted sound, which the witnessed characterized as sounding like "B-I-N-G."  PD))
Sqare obj w 3 white lights and blue nose light seen by residents of neighborhood.  Caused houses to shake.
GA Hwy. Patrol relay rept from Sandhill, PA, area.  One observer repts. strange obj. headed in direction of Atlanta.
Man reports obj. w/ red, blue, and green lights. ( Possible twinkling star.)
Woman repts. multiple red bright lights hovering, maneuvering "over the mountains."  Objects reptd. to ascend "pretty fast."
Man witnesses a "flaming, orange-red" object streak down out of the sky and disappear from sight over the horizon.  No visible explosion.
Man rpts very large, circular obj passing slowly across N sky from W to E to horizon.  Dia. of full moon!  Burning material ejected.
Young man reports huge, bright white light, "w/ green wake," pass overhead very fast.  Other witnesses stopped cars.
Man hears dog barking, goes outside, sees a bright "falling star."  Looked like "a spider dropping on a string." (See 26SE95.)

A woman, originally for Thailand,  noticed a very bright light hovering in the sky, and a smaller light closer to the horizon.  When she pulled into her driveway, her radio suddenly increased its volume by itself.  She obtained her camcorder and took footage of the two objects.  Her step-daughter was inside watching the television, and was able to get a channel on the satellite T-V that traditionally she can't pick up.  The larger object suddenly appears to expand to five times its original size, then shrinks again.  Then, a light, like a "meteorite," shoots by it, which is visible in the tape.  Both objects begin to rise up at the same rate and disappear from sight.  The local airport tower at Meridian had no record of aircraft in the area at the time.  Objects were totally silent.
Older woman alerted by barking dogs.  Sees multiple bizarre, bright, colored spheres floating across farmyard.  2nd sighting.
Five witnesses rept. observing strange light in eastern sky.  Saw it on 21FE and 22FE, as well.  (Possible star?)
Business owner sees "bluish-white ball of light" streaking W to E in S sky.  Orange tail,  gave off sparks.  Very fast, horiz. flt.
Mother & daughter witness strange, bright lights, which appear to be moving relative to background stars.  (Facts incomplete.)
Two men driving on major hwy. witness a strange triangle overhead w/ red, green, & yellow lights directly overhead.  Flew slowly.
Multiple FAA controllers experience 3rd sighting: 19FE, 17MR, 23MR.  Obj. returned light signal; no radar sig.
Man repts. object streaks overhead to SE horizon.
Man & woman camped on shore witness flashing, pyramid-shaped obj. w/ multiple flashing lights.  Radiated beams of light.
Young woman in Seattle Univ. dormitory sees bizarre, pronounced red, pink, blue intense, multiple flashes of light in clouds to east.
Boatload of young fisherman witness very large, orange obj.  It returns their light signal, then zips off.
Two brothers pull off highway to rest during all-night drive.  One remembers experiencing strange,  sharp buzzing sound; confused.
Multiple witnesses to huge black ship, which hovers over basketball court.  Within 30' of ground.  Seen again 21JN & 10JL95.
3 carloads of young people witness red light hovering over corn field.  Then see a large, gray, domed obj. hovering nearby.
Man reports very bright body just below the moon.  (Possible planet?)
Senior med. care exec. calls to discuss events re 09/15/95 sighting in NYC harbor.  Many other responsible witnesses found.
Woman w/ nephew & niece witness "long, white thing w/ a red tail" streak from E to S horizon.  It was shaped like rocket.
Man reports witnessing "neon light" hovering in southern sky.  Obj. shoots off & disappears.
Five adults see very bright cylinder (or saucer??) in clear night sky.  Multiple colors.  Called 911.
Woman (prior caller) repts. 3x12' rectangular section of driveway illuminated from above.  Similar to her incident 22FE95.
Young man repts. stationary, bright, colorful light in E sky.  (Possible star)
Young woman repts. witnessing multiple "flashes of red and blue light" in and above the clouds.  Were to the NE of Capitol Hill.
Man reports bright object "at 7 o'clock position from moon."  (Possible planet?)
Amateur astronomer repts. sighting peculiar, blinking obj in eastern sky w/ telescope. (Time & date uncertain).
Woman reports that son & playmates witness large, black circular craft.  Multiple sightings. (Facts unclear.)

Man calls from Tonasket Sheriff's office to report sighting huge, square, dark object hovering over rural ranch.  All his animals were upset and "going crazy."  He decided to try to shoot the object from the top floor of his barn, but by the time he reach the second floor, the object was gone.  Observer experienced pronounced physiological effects, not evident until next morning.  Man's long-time friend calls later to attest to man's stable and reliable nature.  She discusses strange disappearance of a local 9-yr. old girl that had never been explained.
Couple witness multiple round, or oblong, lights in night sky. Positioned in circle.  Seen to move south to north, then reverse course.
Woman repts. a bright, stationary light in N sky, 2-3 deg. above horizon.  Red, blue, white. (Star?)

Woman reports witnessing bizarre, brilliantly bright round object in night sky near her home.  It was "Kelly green."  It moved very deliberately to the west, disappearing over the horizon.  Other neighbors witnessed the object.
Cloud Co., KS, Sheriff's office reports "2 circular spheres, w/ revolving center," had been obtained from citizen. Many other callers.
Young man northbound on I-405 at S-Curves sees green ball of light streak straight down.  Good report.
Young man videos peculiar disc, "w/ double level row of windows," hovering N of city. Many witnesses, TV coverage. Good video.
Second call from two men witnessing multiple craft streaking across sky.  Obj. are disc-shaped, w/ blue & red lights on edge.
Man & friend witness bright obj. descend through clouds, "pulling clouds with it."  Hovered  within 75 yds.. Bright lights.
Woman out walking sees "round object w/ ring oriented vertically around it."  Appeared in E sky, passed overhead to hor. in 30 sec..
Telephoned report:n repts. seeing 4 circular dots of light in a row, connected by "streak of light."  Color of "static electricity."
Three Boeing employees on break see "low star" move, change color, become green triangle in SW sky. Good rept.
Man w/ father-in-law witness a "pulsating object" move across sky from S to N.  15 minutes later, witness similar object.
Woman & daughter, walking from garage to house, witness sudden yellow streak pass overhead.  Daughter was frightened by it.
Mother & son witness bizarre obj., "the size of a football," hovering in sky.  They pursue it in truck for some reason.  Both alarmed.
Man witnesses four strange lights in formation in NW sky.  2 lights  were bright & large; 2 were dull & smaller.  Disappeared
Man witnesses "blimp w/ reddish & yellow lights" in sky SW of Tucson.  (Detailed data not provided.)
Man repts. seeing "a slender object, with a string of lights across body." As wide as a full moon.  Observed w/ binocs.  Very unusual.
Woman in hammock witnesses brightly lighted "red ball" descend from sky, fly into garage!  Ascends, flies to 2nd obj. in sky.
Woman woke up in middle of night, witnesses four bright lights in two formations.  It alarmed her for some reason.
Empl. of KREM-TV calls regarding multiple sightings of bright green object w/ orange tail reported by multiple callers.
Two young girls out walking, hear dogs barking, then see bizarre craft hovering nearby.  Then see 4 others.  Round, large, w/ lights.
Woman & son encounter 3 "double sets of headlights" hovering in sky.  Moved to left of car; silhouette visible. Shot beam of light.
Young woman & friend witness bizarre, red disc fly north in front of their car.  Engine failed, radio acted strangely. Disappeared.
2 women driving 15 miles SE of city, encounter huge disc hovering almost motionless.  Red, white, blue lights.  Pain, marks on skin.
Man sees  w/ binocs. motionless, white obj.. Suddenly disappears then reappears in other part of sky.  Red, metallic in appearance.
Man repts."long silver obj., seemed to roll, alternated from silver to gray."  Had a "red glow" near tail, released gold/yellow sparks.

Woman reports that two friends, a man and his wife, were in their boat fishing off of Diamond Head, Oahu Island.  At approximately 0500 hrs., both of them heard a very loud noise, "like two large trucks," and observed a bizarre hump-backed, triangular object hovering in the sky nearby.  The object had "windows," but they were opaque.  The object was seen to move, but only very slowly.  When it moved, the red light on the ventral side of the object alternated red and green blinking.  Then it moved toward the vicinity of Diamond Head, where it hovered for 5 minutes, after which it moved slowly westward along the coastline and finally disappeared from sight.
Teacher repts. 14-yr. old photog. stud. photographs strange obj. that appeared black, white, red, elongate.
Young rock climber repts. town of Vantage closed by police.  He and partner had seen hovering obj. N of town.
Woman repts. very bright obj. in S sky.  Brighter than star.  Not visible 23FE95.
Memphis FAA controller relays sighting rept.--- Man sees green "roman candle" descend to ground, streak north.
Man witnesses flash of light in room, looks outside.  Sees an "almond-shaped" obj. in western sky.  Motionless at first, moves.
Three young people witness a triangular-shaped craft hovering nearby.  Craft had 2 white lights, 1 red.  Maneuvered slowly.
Man sees bizarre cluster of 5 lights in straight line.  Center 3 strobed.  Obj. moves north, dips below trees. Turned w/o banking.
Mother & son see a bright body moving overhead relatively fast.  Larger than star. Color was "auburn yellow." Other repts., too.
Young man repts. he returned home from store, neighborhood boys excited about strange obj. that had just passed overhead.
Young couple witness 2 "huge" objects pass overhead.  Had no wings, 20 lights (est.) per side.  Very visible; "hummed."  Good rpt.
Man repts. "huge" flaming obj. w/ enormous flaming tail descend at 60 deg. below horizontal.  Obj. appeared to burn out.
Woman reports seeing strange, lighted obj. with  "arms."  Many witnesses and written reports.
Young man & grandfather see a "large, orange, round or oval" obj. move along horizon very fast, hover, move erratically.  Bizarre!
7 witnesses on Phinney Ridge see 4-6 tiny metallic "cigars" hovering, moving, ascending in cloudless sky.  Dramatic sighting!
Young woman repts. seeing a disc streak overhead very fast.  Solid light in center, blinking lights around edge.  Called police.
Woman & friend witness "green ball of light" streak across sky, descend below overcast, & stop.  Hovered, streaked off.  Good rept.

Man is awakened by barking dogs, and goes outside to smoke.  As he looked at the storm clouds overhead, he noticed approximately 50 bright blue objects in the night sky.  At first he thought they were stars, but then realized they were moving and occasionally forming into "starlike" clusters.  Some moved west toward the ocean, and others appeared to rise up higher in the atmosphere, at which point they would be joined by smaller, green objects, that appeared to fly in from out in space.  The larger objects appeared to be emitting a pulsing light.  They also seemed to be flying into, and between, the tops of the storm clouds in the area.  The observer tired of the events after approximately 45 minutes and went back to bed.
Man & neighbor witness sudden bright flash on very clear night, followed by "contrail" rising vertically.  Disappears from sight.
Man reports up to nine bizarre, white  objects flying strangely overhead. (Calls 2nd time to report  they are birds.)

Father and daughter, both amateur astronomers, witness a strange red light in southerly sky as they are driving to nearby promontory to set up 8" telescope.  Together w/ three other witnesses, observe red, circular disc which appears imbedded in red, or pink "cloud " of light.  It is observed to shoot out much smaller objects, which depart "like shooting stars."  Object turned blue or white, ascended at 40-45% angle, and streaked off.
Man witnessed an unusual, multi-colored light the size of a large star, that passed overhead.  It disappeared to the north in about 20 seconds.
Man sitting in hot tub sees "satellite" in E sky.  Obj. suddenly accelerated dramatically, made zigzag turns, departed very fast.

A young girl and boy were returning from a fast-food restaurant, when they witnessed strange lights hovering in the vicinity of the local school.  They rushed home and told the girl's mother, and the three of them returned to the school with a camcorder.  The mother taped four or five objects in the night sky, which hovered, and occasionally streaked off.  They were totally silent. The local airport reported no known aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
Young woman repts. triangular ship suspended in SE sky, three smaller lights below larger object.  Objs. fly off.
Computer engin. repts. seeing triangular ships over TN almost nightly.  Repts. overhearing radio commo. of  F-15  firing on UFO.

Telephoned Report:Prof. race car driver encounters bizarre, bright blue obj. hovering above ground in lonely valley.  Obj. strobes blue, green, streaks off.  VERY DRAMATIC SIGHTING. The witness exhibited signs of having experienced missing time, and during subsequent telephone conversations, he reported experiencing strange sensations, and "seeing" peculiarly shaped faces.  PD))((NUFORC Note:  One of several reports of the dramatic "fireball" that streaked over Ontario, Canada; Lake Ontario; and Pennsylvania.  NUFORC has many dramatic accounts of the event, and a video tape, provided to NUFORC by Texas UFO investigator, Amy Hebert.  PD))
Rept. that local police had pursued a strange obj., and incident was "hushed up." (Facts unclear)
FAA controller repts. seeing extremely bright "meteor" streak almost straight down to southern horizon.  "Prob. visible over L. Isl."
Woman w/ children & neighbor see dark obj. fly overhead, land on lawn. Flashing lights in house next day. F-16's.
Man & wife, 2 hours' drive W of El Paso on Hwy 10, witness black, round object just above ground.  Obj. rises, goes behind hill!
Man repts. seeing "silver cylinder" moving in sky.  (Facts not complete.)
14-yr. old youth w/ friends witness very bright, white, oval light in NE sky.  (Facts unclear)
Young man & girlfriend witnessed strange red lights motionless in sky near Snowflake, AZ. Reptd. to police.
Man (pilot, astronomer) witnesses very bright obj. moving fast across sky.  Disappeared from sight behind trees.
Telephoned Report: Woman & children at fam. reunion see unlighted, round obj. "colored like pearl" pass overhead against wind.  See 3 more sec. later.
Woman witnesses four very bright yellow lights appear, then disappear sequentially.  (Note: Was military  flares over local airport.)
Multiple witnesses observe huge triangular ship, surrounded by four disc-shaped ships, w/ up to 50 bizarre creatures underneath!
Two men witness "round object w/ flame trail" descend out of sky.  Color was "white w/ slight fire color."  Very large.
Woman (77 yrs.) repts. witnessing strange obj. ascending "like jet plane" near Danville airport.  Bizarre object.

Adult male reports experience as child.  He was delivering newspapers, when he heard a woman scream.  He turned toward the scream and witnessed triangular ship in the daytime sky.  He was terrified by the sighting, and went home immediately.
Man witnesses "small whitish, blue-green ball" pass overhead, flying to east.
Woman & husband witness "extremely brilliant white light w/ pink & blue" in the E sky.  Appeared to eject obj. Changed shape.
Woman repts. stationary obj. in sky.  Looks round, possibly reflecting sunlight.  Started moving, then "just disappeared."

Three men were standing on a railroad loading dock.  They observed approximately nine objects in loose formation abreast, which were flying north.  They called the sighting to the attention of the foreman, who may have witnessed it, as well.
MUFON investigator reports sighting near Mica Peak.  Multi-colored obj. flying erratically.  No radar contact.
Mother & daughter hear strange "rattling" sound.  Witness small saucer-shaped craft descend "like feather."  Red & yellow lights.

Three people were driving on highway north of Los Angeles near coast, when they observed a large, bright, orange light.  No object was visible in the ball of light.  It changed size and shape as it gained altitude and moved to the west.  It left a long tail of illuminated substance in the sky.  The tail extended out to the side of the object at 75 or 80 degrees, and it glowed.  Swath of light was estimated to be 1/4 or 1/2 mile wide, based on an estimated distance from the observers.
Member of military (active) witnesses bizarre "metallic, rectangular" obj. hover over desert.  Sees 4 times!  Pursued by 11 aircraft!
Woman repts. sighting of disc, which landed, leaving burning circle in grass.  Claimed U.S. Agents present.
2nd MO Hwy Patrol officer calls, confirms sightings and many UFO calls prior evening.

Mother and son witnessed a very bright light in sky while driving in rural part of county.  They stopped car, and light seemed to split into two "headlights."  The object approached them and went directly overhead.  It looked silver and metallic, but it had no wings.  As it flew away from them, observers could see flashing light on tail.
Man feels urge to go outside house.  Briefly sees formation of 4 "bright, pale orange" objects streak overhead very fast to N horizon.
Responsible woman, member of MUFON, witnesses very bright light during daylight hours for 5 seconds.  Then it appears again and disappears.
Woman repts. past sighting of perfectly round, red globe floated across city.  2nd one appeared.  Witnessed by reporter, too.
College student walking to restaurant observes two red lights moving overhead.
Man & wife witness multiple, multi-colored objects, some of them "large."  Neighborhood dogs barking wildly.  (Facts unclear.)
CA Hwy Patrol Office of Res. & Planning calls to request info. about UFO Rept. Center.

Woman had just finished dinner, and had just turned out all the lights in her rural beach property.  She noticed an object hovering just above the water, which started to climb.  It stopped, went sideways, then dropped down again.  Object had many lights, and "had frames."
Man & wife witness very bizarre aerial display of 10-20 white lights.  (Probable Disneyland laser display practice.)

Telephoned Report:Woman heard a strange noise and went outside to investigate.  She witnessed a tremendously bright light hovering motionless in the morning sky, 45 degrees off the horizon in the southeast sky.  She saw the same, or similar, object 75 minutes later with binoculars as it moved horizontally toward Tewksbury.  It broke up into multiple objects.  Second similar object approached directly toward her, then suddenly disappeared.
Man & son witness a small, round, brown object high in sky.  Hovered in place, accelerated suddenly, and flew north.
Group of 9 watch bright white light hover, maneuver rapidly, above Pacific Ocean.  Obj. moved rapidly; descended to ocean.
Man calls to rept. two sightings in Anaheim on two sequential days.  Sightings reptd. by many witnesses & local newspaper.

Woman witnesses huge, triangular-shaped ship, covered w/ bizarre lights, "like traffic lights."   Very dramatic sighting.((NUFORC Note:  We spoke via telephone with this young woman, on the night of her sighting.  She was returning home with a load of groceries, at the time of the sighting. We cannot emphasize with words how upset the witness sounded, when she called.  Her sighting may have been of the same object that had just passed down the coast of Maine, across New England, and then further down the eastern seaboard.  This is one of the cases that I lecture on, during public presentations.  PD))
Man & fiancee witness bizarre obj. that looked "like lampshade" hovering in sky.  Very bright w/ circulating lights, little windows.
Woman witnesses 3 very bright lights east of I-5.  Maneuvered in sky instantaneously.  Green & white.
Inyo Co. Sheriff's office relays UFO rept..  Person reported "large, green & yellow, oblong object" flying east.
Woman, radio DJ witness gray "barrel-like" obj., red light in center.  Dog barked, acted strangely for 2 days.
Young woman repts. seeing large object--"10 times the size of an airplane"--above.  (Facts unconfirmed.  No written rept.)
Woman & 9-yr. daughter heard "sirens" then noticed obj. sitting above nearby trees.  Looked "like Xmas lights."  Followed them.
Mennonite College instructor reports UFO flap is in process in that area of PA
Man  repts. past sighting on Mother's Day '94.  13 objects in clear sky over N. Seattle, "wiggling up & down, back & forth."
Woman calls regarding fiance who is having peculiar "flash back" recall of alien type creatures.  Directed to investigator.
Man reports 2 "white UFO's w/ red & green spinning lights"  hovering N & NW of Allentown, PA.
Man witnesses cluster of objects "like arrows" streaking overhead at (apparently) high altitude.  Called FAA office to rept.
Man standing outside sees what looks like "shooting star." Obj. split into 3 lights, "like isosceles triangle," shot across sky to SE
Father & son,  fishing,  witness bizarre flashing light, which moved across sky,  increased height. Bizarre through binoculars.
Woman witnesses two lights in clear night sky.  Colors were red, white, green, and blue.  Moved slowly across sky. (Possible stars?)

Telephoned Report:  At appoximately 1800 hrs., a man, headed east from Marysville and noticed a large triangular object on north side of road moving in a westerly direction.  He stopped his car and tried to follow the object on foot, but it accelerated slightly and he could not keep up with it.  He returned to his car and pursued the object to the west.  The object was totally silent.The object banked to its left, accelerated, and proceded south. At 2145 hrs., the same observer was westbound from Lake Stevens on the trestle, and witnessed the same, or a similar, object.  He stopped his car and watched the object for approx. 4 minutes.  Finally, the object banked to the left, apparently accelerated, and departed to the west.  Again, no sound was detectable from the observer's vantage point.
Man witnesses peculiar craft "with vertical stabilizer," which suddenly streaks off. Wife witnessed same obj. from different position.
Man & wife witness orange, "dirty yellow" cigar-shaped obj. above W horizon.  Passed behind tree, faded out.
Young man witnessed red and moving lights in the direction of the Cascade Mountains to the east.  Red light was flashing.
Girl reports sighting strange object.  ( Facts unclear.)
UFO report from Lycoming County.  On 19NO95, Sunday, I called Mr. Richard Secules, who said that the UFO was advertising lights, the type that spin around.
Man repts. large "ball of fire" descend at 45 deg. angle.  Descended behind mountains 6-7 mi. distant.  Prominant tail. Ejected obj.

Obs. reports he was lying on his bed in his small apartment, when he heard a "transformer" sound.  He then noticed "two guys going on" in his apartment, apparently rummaging through the observer's mail on a coffee table in his living room.  The creatures were wearing "sciba divers" suits, and they had on "wrap around" type "glasses" on.  They were carrying "flashlights," and they "photographed" the observer w/ the device, which blinded the man.  The creatures then exited the apartment by walking through the wall.  It was "definitely real," the observer reported.
Young woman & boyfriend witness "galaxy" of lights on other side of Pend Oreille River.  Rept. strange creature. (Facts unclear)
Woman repts. a strange light passes overhead at extremely high speed.  Flew totally silently, left an "after image" in the sky.
Man reports peculiar lights circling his residence.  (Probable advertising lights.)
Several young people witness "lime-green, glowing sphere" descend from W to E in N sky, disappear below hor.  Other repts.

Director of Tennessee Emergency Management Agency calls to relay report TEMA had received.  A woman and her daughter had reported witnessing multiple ships near Cainesville Road, two large ones and several smaller, white ones.  At 0625, the white ones were seen suddenly to gather around the big ones.  The last smaller ship was red.  Colors observed during the sighting were red, blue, blue-green, and white.  They looked like "beautiful clamshells."  When the objects moved, they bobbed up and down, and every other direction.  When they departed, they moved very fast, and they left a visible tail that "looked like a baseball bat."
Man witnesses  " yellow string of lights" streak from horizon to horizon in 8-9 sec.  7 or 8 objects in group.
Exper. UFO investigator, husband, driving S on I-5 witness prominent "red ball."  Obj. splits, white light appears.  Both wink out.
Woman repts. witnessing dramatic disturbance in local reservoir caused by large "falling" object.  Other witnesses in LA, NC (?).
Mother reports children approached by circular obj. w/ lights. Directly overhead. Telepathic msg. reported.
Woman witnesses dramatic, bright "comet-like" obj. descending rapidly to N.  Was dark area between head & tail.
Woman repts. "4 lights, then 6 lights, look like bright street lights in the sky."  Criss-crossing, dancing motion. (Adv. lights?)
OR citizen on Space Needle sees 3 "dull orange lights" fly overhead.  Objects performed some unusual movement in formation.
Woman repts. daylight sighting of bright, silver "helmet-shaped" obj. in E sky.  2nd similar obj. approached it, streaked E!
Man sees blue-green obj. hover below overcast for 45 sec..  Streaks off, leaving veil of red sparks.
Young woman reports sighting.  (Facts unclear; awaiting written rept.)
Father, son, & many bystanders witness incredible "starlike" obj. w/ "white aura, long green tail," STREAK FAST from NE to SW.
Multiple witnesses observe 2 white lights near Camano Island.  Moved.  MUFON member followed up.
Two calls in rapid sequence regarding multiple objects streaking north (?) over city.  (Sincere repts., no follow-up written repts.)
Man wakes up w/ 2 strange cuts on cheek.  Recalls recurring dream.  Calls sheriff's office. Sends photos of cuts.
Woman repts seeing circular craft with "kidney-bean shaped, soft amber lights."  Flew over house.  Called Folsom Police.
Woman and daughter witness w/ binoculars 2 strange lights in sky.  Flashing white, red, green.  (Not inconsistent w/ twinkling star.)
Woman sees four bright lights moving across sky, w/ red, flashing light on tail.  Loud sound.  Flew south.
Woman sees bizarre disc outside house.  Looked like "red/orange circle w/ blurred edges."
Woman w/ kids see 3 "space shuttle" type craft hover, streak. Eject smaller objects (!).  Many witnesses.  Good rept.
Woman w/ 2 neighbors witness peculiar green lights in, or above, clouds.  At one point, lights appeared to become a "bright beam."
Woman witnessed strange, blinking light in SW sky.  It simply winked out suddenly.
2nd similar sighting.  Woman sees a large, bright red/orange disc, followed by blinking sphere, streak by window 2nd day in row.

Caller called on morning of 19SE95 to report sighting.  Caller reported the following: The caller reported that at 2208 hrs. (eastern), she was riding the Staten Island Ferry from the tip of Manhattan to Staten Island.  Just as the ferry was passing Governor's Island, she became aware of a commotion on the east side of the ferry boat.  People were rushing to that side of the ferry, shouting, pointing, and generally raising a ruckus.  She decided to try to determine was the cause of the disturbance, and walked outside onto the passenger deck.  What she saw shocked her.  The object was huge, and it obscured the passengers' view of Governor's Island.  Many of them reported that the object looked like a city, with lights and a skyline.  However, its presence apparently roiled the water beneath it, causing a froth to appear on the water's surface!! For days afterward, the witnessed handed out leaflets at the ferry terminal, hoping to contact other passengers who had seen the object.  Those same people approached 9-1-1 facilities, requesting copies of the tape recorded reports of the object, which was also seen from Governor's Island, but the tapes were either missing, or not made available, they were told. A video tape about the incident was prepared, a copy of which is in the possession of NUFORC. This incident apparently was VERY dramatic, and it was witnessed by dozens, or perhaps hundreds, of people.  We would be most grateful if anyone else who was present that night would please submit a report about what they saw that night.
Man repts. past sighting in 1957 near Mt. Baldy.  Witnessed two bright "white and blue" stars pursued by jet fighters.
New Orleans FAA ATRR called to say that they had received a UFO report from a caller.
Teen w/ friends witness two large, orange lights hovering.  Objs. descend, move away.  1/4 diameter of full moon.
Seattle Times reporter calls about Quilcene sighting on 07FE95.  No article published.
Woman and friend witnesses "striped, square" ship streak towards them while driving home.  Followed them.  Good rept..
Man repts. strange green light behind clouds.  Seemed to generate "ripple" effect in atmosphere.
Bizarre "aircraft" w/ 8-12 flashing lights flies silently over man's vehicle, turns, flies north. Many other sightings.
Man rpts hearing on "Mutual Network News" of bizarre UFO landing, interaction,  in Malaysia. (See Bangkok News early JN95!)
Man sees TV coverage of obj. over Salida, CO (27AU95).  He and many other bus riders W of Deming, NM, saw same object!

Young man went into his back yard to fill his dog's water dish, when he noticed the dog was looking into the sky.  He looked up and saw two prominent red lights apparently hovering in the sky.  A small, private aircraft flew by, and the red lights appeared to approach, and possibly follow, the plane.  Then they returned to the location in the sky where he had first noticed them.  He called his wife out to look at them, at which time a police cruiser with two officers was driving by and stopped.  The officers looked at the lights and were unable to explain them.
Ex-USAF/aerospace empl.(ret.) sees very bright, pure white light descend vertically. Extraordinary sighting.  Good rept.
Denver FAA  relays rept. from comm. aircraft: Crew sees obj. zigzag at Mach 4 (!) on collision avoidance radar (TCAS)@36'K. alt.
Young woman witnesses "neon green & yellow" object zigzagging overhead.  Dog very agitated, would not leave house.

To whom it may concern:Someone on the Internet gave me this email address to report a  UFO sighting.  I'm not sure what you want but I'll give you a few details:My fiance' and I were driving down Route 3 East in Virginia, I think we had passed Route 301, and were heading towards Colonial Beach.  This was Sunday, August 20 1995, at 1345 EST.  We both saw a bright reflection in the sky, the sun was reflecting off of it and we thought it was an airplane.  I guess it turned a little because the brightness stopped.  We both watched for a few seconds, and noticed it didn't have any wings or tail like an airplane would have.  It was cigar shaped, (it looked like a 747 w/o wings or a tail).  All of a sudden it was gone!  I looked down at the road for a second (I was driving), looked back up and couldn't find it.  My fiance' said it just disappeared!Please let me know if any other sightings were reported on the East Coast this weekend.  Was I seeing things?  I've always believed in UFO's but I never thought I'd see one!                                   ((name and address deleted))
Telephoned Report:50-60 people witness several peculiar objs. to W maneuvering over water.  Call goes out over CB radio net regarding objects.
USAF officer calls to relay report from couple who witnessed bright white light, w/ red  & blue lights.
2nd Seattle Univ. student calls to report remarkable "pink and " blue flashing lights in, or above the clouds.
Woman and grandson witness large, oval, brightly lighted obj. W of Murphy, NC.  Similar sighting 03/28/95 @8pm
Woman observes peculiar "red star" in N sky.  Viewed it w/ coworkers.  Obj. finally moved off and disappeared from sight.
Nat. UFO Center Director makes 3 hour appearance on national radio program.   Multiple calls follow for 2 days.
Young boy repts. witnessing strange light overhead at his residence.  (Facts unclear; no follow-up rept.)
Woman suddenly awakens at dawn and witnesses bright red "dot" hovering outside her window. Suddenly got larger, moved to N.
Many individuals report multiple objects in formation moving, zigzagging  in sky above city.  Had red, green, & white lights.
Woman and landlord witness "two boxes connected at one corner" drifting north.  Faint reddish color.  Witness alarmed by sighting.
FAA empl. relays facts of written rept.  Man and woman encounter 3 bizarre ships that hovered over them on Hwy. 70.
Man & son witness "round, green object, like circle inside circle" streak across sky, disappear.  Very clear view.  Good rept..
Woman calls to report a "UFO" in southern sky.  Flashing red, blue, green lights; stationary.  (Possible star?)
Fed. empl. (pilot & a/c mech.) w/ 2 co-workers witness 2 metallic discs approach from E sky below contrails, turn, streak. Exclnt.
Woman's voice repts. 4 objects over home in rural area.  (Facts unclear--no return call; phone disconnected 2 days later.)
Son wakes mother; both witness clump of bright, white lights overhead in formation.  "Like clump of stars." Obj. streaks off.
Bakersfield Californian (newspaper) publishes front-page photo of peculiar flaming disc w/ tail.  No explanation provided.
Man calls regarding sighting of triangular ship he witnessed over Univ. of  Washington campus.  (Reported in l993.)
Young woman repts. seeing "4 very bright lights."  Objs. hovered, then streaked off.  (Caller failed to leave phone #.)
Man repts. sighting over Bakersfield.  (Facts unclear; no return call.)
Computer engin. repts. strange conversation re UFO's w/ USAF officers at Patrick AFB, FL.  They used (seemingly) covert names.
Man sees bright light approaching; prominent in night sky. Splits into 3 lights, 1 white, 2 red. Drifts off.
Two males walking on railroad tracks see luminous, white disc descend from clouds, level out, turn, streak north.
Colville Police Disp. repts. "blue, shimmering thing" observed.  Then it "blew up," and disappeared.
Man reports object with white & red lights "very close to sun and moon." (??)  (Detailed facts not available.)
Son wakes mother to observe peculiar pulsing red, blue, yellow lights positioned in row.  Obj. appears to eject colored light.
Young man in back of p/u truck, witnesses "flaming red/orange" obj. to W, near Luke AFB.  Flares, dims, rises vert., winks out.
FAA Controller calls to relay sighting report of "shiny, round object" witnessed on 11JN95 over Ogden, UT.
Woman & daughter witness strange, large cloud formation.  Daughter saw an actual object in cloud.
Woman repts. a "white, round meteor," viewed from Rte. 64.  Viewed to north approx. 25 deg. above horizon.
Red light seen over Fargo below clouds.  Hovered for 10 min., faded, flashed, slowly moved east. Seen twice.

Telephoned Report:Mother and six children were driving northwest on Zaring Cutoff Road, when the children spotted bright lights to the right side.  They were three seemingly identical black, delta-shaped ships with a very bright yellow or white "headlight" on the front, which was scanning the ground ahead of and below them as they flew across the road at an estimated speed of 5 m.p.h..  After the objects had crossed the road, passing directly over the car, they turned south and continued moving in that direction.((NUFORC Note:  We spoke with the mother and some of the older children, and they were quite sincere and convincing.  The mother intimated that she did not care to go outside after dark after the incident.  Please see the illustrations from the witnesses, posted to the NUFORC website at the following address:  http://www.nuforc.org/CB941229.htmlPD))
While looking at stars, man sees "satellite." 2nd obj. streaks up to 1st, merges w/ it. Then, 3rd obj. streaks up to 2 others.
Oakland FAA calls to rept. UFO sighting rept. from comm. pilot returning from Las Vegas.
College stud. sees 3 objs. in formation pass directly overhead.  Very fast.  Covers 120 deg. in 7 seconds.
Young woman calls to rept. witnessing "Pegasus-like" obj. w/ "flapping wings."  (No other calls).
Police Dept. calls to relay report.  (Telephone line suddenly goes dead.  No return call.)
Telephoned Report:Man repts. seeing "elliptical, solid object" descend through clouds.  Was not plane, had no wings.  Obj. darted "all over the place."
Young man, mother witness watch strange red obj. 45 deg. above horizon w/ binocular.  Obj. suddenly fades, disappears from sight.
Woman reports seeing bizarre, large, white light over Seattle.  (Limited facts available as of 21NO95.)
Experienced ufologist reports seeing large, round, white light that moved across sky.  Saw 2 other small obj..
FAA controller relays  UFO sighting  reported by "crew" of aircraft 15 miles SE of Lakeland FL. Vortac. Did not show on a/c radar.
Man driving S to Oakville sees obj. w/ tiny lights on bottom, flashing light on top moving N, suddenly reverse course.  Good rept.
Telephoned Report: Woman driving on Redmond-Wdinville Hwy hears strange buzzing noise, then sees peculiar blue light, bigger than moon, going N..
Man was walking during the early morning and witnesses three very colorful objects to the southwest.  They appear to move, one of the objects bobbing down below the horizon and returning to view.

Woman was awakened by barking dogs in the early morning hours.  She observed two "falling stars," which turned into "dome lights."  They moved further away from the observer, then they appeared to move closer.  They appeared to remain in paired formation.  They appeared capable of moving very fast.  Soon after the objects were first spotted, military jet aircraft entered the area.  Aircraft "were everywhere" on the previous night, as well.
Seattle City Light employee, who had witnessed strange object along Route 20 in December 1994, reports strange lights near horizon, and dropping down below horizon.  No follow-up report.
Woman reports observing peculiar light flashing white, green, blue.  Sees same object 2 days later. (Possible star?)
Woman witnessed two flashing lights, then five lights.  Moved across sky in bizarre manner.
Two men witnes peculiar bright flash in sky, followed by 4 beeps.  Then witness object streaking across sky, turns, flashes.
Young woman goes outside, see group of teenage girls looking as sky.  Large cigar-ship w/ bright lights hovering in sky.   Other rpts.
Man sees pecular green light w/ "comet-like tail" streak from W to E 70 degrees above S horizon.  3x size of Venus.  Very bright.
Experienced logger repts. three very bright lights in morning sky.  Middle one rises, accelerates into distance; others follow!

Mother and son were driving at dusk in SE Wyoming, when her son noticed a strange white light, brighter than the sun, pass behind a cloud, and then descend into it.  The object was being pursued by an aircraft, which had a flashing red light on it. The circular object was approximately ten times the apparent size of the red light on the aircraft.  The aircraft circled the cloud the object had descended into, and then left.  The object was not observed again. Warren AFB at Cheyenne, WY, was contacted, but they reported no radar contact.
Man reports seeing bizarre sighting while aboard Flight #725 enroute from Denver to Portland.
MUFON member reports gigantic, black ship passes NNE over house at 5 mph. 20 min sighting. Good rept.
Nurse returning home sees "bright white light shoot over her truck, straight ahead (of her)."  Upset.  Possible phy. effect on car.
Husband & wife witness strange, bright light in night sky.  Other reports in area for same night.  (Facts unclear.)
Mother heard high-pitch whine pass over house.  Daughter witnessed large circular craft w/ multiple circular whitish, yellow lights.
Woman reports bright, "neon-like" light, which moved, got brighter,  ascended vertically very fast.
Man rpts. bizarre obj moving in night sky near "Keesler" (AFB?).  Other objs near.  All w/ strange red & blue lights, maneuvered.
Woman watching satellite, sees small, round ball moving across the sky.  Ran around corner of bldg. to follow obj., but was gone.
Man repts. bright obj. overhead, "brighter than Jupiter."  Moves slowly to SE, enters haze at 15' K, disappears from view.
Man, lying on bed, sees very bright ball of light enter apt.. Could feel heat from obj., felt paralyzed.  Loud humming above
Local police relay rept. from youth, who had reported seeing saucer-shaped obj. w/ dome and marker lights.
Woman & fiance' witness strange light in E sky.  Was visible at 0610 hrs. same day.  (Not vis. in same area of sky next night.)
Man witnesses bright obj. in E sky.  It moves "strangely, fast," approached second "star," rose very quickly, disappeared. Alarmed.
Man calls to report woman's sighting. She had seen bright light 1-2 miles away; dims, then splits into 6 obj.

Man and his two sons were driving south on I-405, when they all saw two pairs of white lights.  One of the pairs of lights started moving to the northwest.  Each pair of lights were so close that they almost appeared to be one light, but they were distinct pairs, nevertheless.  They were stationary for quite a period of time.  The observers estimated they were 400-500 feet off the ground, and perhaps 1 mile south of I-405.  No strobe lights evident.  Very strange in appearance.Man reported a sighting in l990 with two other witnesses.  Object was 150 feet away; looked like a "cigar."
Mother & son witness strange lighted obj. in S sky. Moved relative to trees. Slowly rose & disappeared.
Prof. mech./pilot w/ daughter witness bright green light w/ tail descend westbound into Ft. Lewis. 2nd sightng of same.
Man repts. peculiar sightings he & sister had experienced sometime during spring l993.  Will send report.
Radio news clearinghouse calls regarding sighting on 03/15/95.  Hundreds of calls received.
Man reports a bright blue obj. that streaked to north below the overcast.  Very bright, very fast.

Two brothers were returning to Pendleton, OR, and Dixie, WA, after hunting in Oregon.  Upon approaching Pilot Rock, OR, the brother driving the lead vehicle, a Suzuki (Samurai?) noticed a peculiar cluster of blue-white colored round lights, positioned in a square or rectangular pattern, ahead.  He called his brother on CB radio (Ch. 4) to ask is he saw it, and the brother answered that he certainly did.  The lights disappeared from sight, then reappeared on the other side of the road.  They passed through Pilot Rock, and the object became visible again as they were leaving that town.  The object had the same appearance as it had had before they arrived at Pilot Rock, and it stayed with them (according to their conscious recollection, for another 30 minutes. The brothers made several interesting observations at the time of the incident.  Most interesting was the fact that even though they were talking over a CB channel that traditionally is used very heavily by loggers, and other users in that area of Oregon (Ch. 4), they heard no other users during the entire experience!  Also, they saw no other traffic on their side of the highway,. even though they remember seeing oncoming traffic in the other lane.  When they got home, they topped off the fuel tanks in their trucks.  Craig's vehicle indicated that he had driven 98.7 miles from deer camp, where both he and his brother had filled their vehicles' fuel tanks from fuel cans.  When they got to Pendleton, his vehicle, which was getting about 25 miles per gallon, took less than 2 gallons of fuel!Craig had spent 9 years in the military, during which time, he said, he had seen many different types of weapons used.  This aerial event, or object, was like nothing he had ever seen before, he said.
Man repts. very clear sighting of a very bright disc, below clouds flying from SW sky.  Made zig-zag movements, flew off.

I would like to report three yellow oval lights which passed over Orlando,Florida on July 4, 1995 at aproximately 21:30 (9:30 pm). These were the sizeof Venus (which they passed close by). Two of them traveled one after the otherat exactly the same speed and path heading south-southeast. The third oneappeared about a minute later following the same path as the other two. Thewhole sighting lasted about 4-5 minutes. There were 4 other witnesses oldenough to report the sighting. My 4 year old and 5 year old children were theones who called my attention to the "moving stars". These objects moved fasterthan an airplane and did not resemble an aircraft, and were moving much slowerthan a shooting star. As for them being fireworks, their path was too regularand coordinated. If anybody else saw this phenomenon, please contact me at:
Comm. pilot repts. multiple, "almost translucent" objects streaking directly over his home in Fall l994.
Woman calls Malmstrom AFB second time, possibly regarding second sighting.  She had called the night before.
Young couple witness strange "white light w/ 2 red lights" pass overhead.  Object made several sharp turns, flies strangely.
Retired ship captain reports strange light to NE.  (Later writes to confirm obj. is star.)
Man repts. seeing obj. "w/ long tail, several football fields long."  Left bright, broad trail in night sky.
Young woman reports red streak passing east to south over Lawrence Livermore facility.
Woman repts. 2 sightings of red light hovering. Turns white.  For some reason,  4-yr. old daughter frightened by sighting.
Young man sees 3 solid lights; pulls off highway.  Sees gigantic,  gray triangle w/ "archways."  Good rept,  excellent drawing.

Man went outside at 0715 to pick up papers and noticed in western sky what appeared to be "fireworks" dropping out of the sky below clouds under conditions of excellent visibility.  The objects stopped descending, forming a cluster of six to the right, and one solitary object to the left of the others, all above Riverside.  They were distinctly golden in color. The objects started moving--"like bubbles move in the wind"--and accelerated rapidly to the west, quickly disappearing from sight.
NC Emer. Commo.Cntr. repts. 2 police officers reporting strange lights in sky near Goose Creek area.
Man (anon.--Boeing empl., former USAF)  repts. witnessing 4 lights, "like balls of light," streaking in night sky, silent.  Bizarre.
Young woman on rural road witnesses strange, bright obj..  Round on top, pointed on bottom.
Two men witness "large white disc, w/ slight yellow tinge, larger than full moon," move slowly across sky to S,  turn. Halo around it.
Man & wife witness cluster of lights move along hor. to NE near Salish Mtn. Obj. suddenly "fires" 4 " bolts of light" at mtn. twice.
2 univ. stud. see dramatic "meteor" in S sky, then witness  chevron of lights "like kite" in same area of sky. Zig-zags off!
Young man in state of excitement calls to report a "big ball of light" had circled him as he walked along RR tracks.  Missing time(?).

Telephoned Report: Man witnesses 3-4 extraordinarily bright flashes above horizon in eastern sky.  Thinks nuclear power station exploded.  Very upset by experience.One of many reports of this incident.((NUFORC Note:  This was the second telephoned report we received about this incident.  The man was located in a  neighborhood to the west of Cleveland.  He sounded very credible, and was very upset by what he had just seen.  PD))
Man witnesses "blue-green object" streaking from the eastern sky to the SE.
Family repts. a stationary obj. in night sky that is flashing red, blue, silver.  Appears to rotate.  (Not inconsistent w/ star.)

Young man hears a strange "swishing" sound approaching from the south.  Three minutes later, he observes a strange, dark ship w/ red lights on nose and tail pass directly overhead at 40 feet above treetops.  He watches it for 3-5 minutes as it passes over town of Noxen, PA, headed north.  Witnesses similar craft 45 minutes later headed south along same course!
Man & wife rept. strange, moving light in sky.  Looks like "three headlights in a row."  Not an airliner or helicopter, they report.
Retired senior comm. pilot, wife, & daughter (comm. pilot) see obj. streak vertically down in western sky.
Woman reports that her grandfather, an American Indian, tells tribal stories very similar in nature to UFO reports.
Woman repts. seeing highly reflective, small obj. maneuvering in sky.  Appeared "to have energy around it."
Woman reports seeing bizarre "white orb" in sky.  As big as an aircraft.  Appeared to be "moving sideways."  Called police, USAF.
Two women witness green obj, "size of full moon," fly directly toward them, descend from SE.  Illuminated trees on top of mtn..
Woman calls to report that 3 children reported seeing "round, alien ship" overhead, w/ yellow, orange, red, white lights.

Two men were playing tennis, when one drew the attention of the other to a very bright object moving very rapidly across the morning sky at a very high angular velocity.  They estimated its altitude at 25,000 feet or greater.  The object was as bright "as a magnesium flare, was very thin in appearance, but it appeared to have no wings.  It flew with a wobbling motion.  One of the observers is a pilot, with a great deal of experience around aircraft under varied conditions.
Multiple calls received regarding strange obj. over Pug. Sound. (Note:  King Co. Airport Sec. Police rept. MIG-17 doing aerobatics.)
2 young men tossing football on high sch. grounds witness approx. 15-20 bizarre obj. in stormy sky.  Some hovered, others moved.
Man repts. football-shaped obj., 30-40' long on N side of I-240.  "Skin" appeared to " rotate" around 2 axes (!).
Woman hears strange, loud humming overhead, which ceases, then starts again.  Looks up, sees multiple strange lights.
Daughter, very upset, wakes mother.  Both witness yellow light descend into nearby field.  Two guard dogs very upset, cringe.
Woman repts.  bright light in NW sky, suddenly approaches her, flies slowly overhead.  Swept wings, 2 blurry lights either side.
Young man reports witnessing "yellow object" moving in sky.  (Facts limited and unclear.)
Man went outside to smoke, witnesses peculiar light pass overhead very fast.  Appeared to move south, but suddenly turned.
Man southbound on I-17 100 miles N of Phoenix sees large "disc " on ground w/ structure on top.  "Fireball" over city next a.m..
Man witnesses multi-colored obj. moving relative to nearby stars.  Appeared to have two smaller objects on each side of it.

Young man sees very bright object streak across the sky at a very high angular velocity.  It appeared to have an exceptionally bright area of light on the upper portion of the trailing portion of the object.  It appeared to change shapes, and then disappeared behind a stand of trees.
Several people witness "4 little red lights" move across sky.  They darted erratically, moved fast.  Some yellow light present, too.
A man and his wife witness strange, metallic disc hovering just above the water.  It streaked off.  Very brief report, and the caller does not call back.
Mother notices "aircraft" over Midway River, suddenly "engine noise" seem to slow.  She & kids see 2 "mushroom shaped" craft.
Woman repts. witnessing unusual, very bright lights, "like airplane lights," in vicinity of Smithville, MO.  Had blinking lights, too.
Woman repts. seeing "round, flashing lights" moving S to N while in hospital.
Husband & wife witness strange, red beam of light stream through screened window of mobile home. 10-12" wide.  Very alarmed.
Young woman sees bizarre green, white, & red "stick," which rotates 90 deg., expands laterally.  Good rept.
Woman, cousin, and neighbors witness large, very bright obj. descend rapidly in SW sky. "1/2 size of moon." Large tail, left trail.
Young boy (14 yrs.), mother, & friend witness large, white obj., size of moon fly almost overhead
Family & 12 athletes witness huge, black disc w/ dome in center.  Very close. Returns on second occasion.
Man repts. "red thing" near North Star.  Obj. seems to illuminate clouds.  Called Sacramento Sheriff's office.
FAA empl. reports 2 stationary radar returns over Lancaster.  USAF radar confirms returns.  Multiple visual sightitings of 2 obj..
Man & wife witness "line of 8-9 lights in a row."  Center light(s) blinked on and off.  Lights then streak out across sky.  Strange.
Woman calls to report seeing large, triangular-shaped, black mass hovering, moving slowly.  Son sees same thing from diff. loc..
Man witnesses "white spot" flying in formation directly above landing 747 aircraft.  Obj. suddenly streaked off.
Telephoned Report: Man steps outside house to smoke, see obj. extending out over edge of roof.  Sees bizarre obj. w/ solid, hazy lights streak off.
Witness repts. huge, brilliantly bright triangle passes overhead.  Lit up area, hovered, turned, streaked off.
Woman repts. hovering light over nearby field.  Hovered, changed colors, moved very slowly. Later, saw 5 lights in formation.

A student employee from KRUA radio station at the Univ. of AK called to enquire about the calls received about two glowing, moving,lights over the Inlet that night.  They received 20-25 calls, including a call from the FAA.  Good consistency between the reports.
Woman repts. bizarre, triangular ship w/ stunning, red, blue, green, & white lights. Surrounded by a haze.  Excellent rept..
Woman repts. seeing strange, bright obj. moving back & forth, moving in circles.  Streaks to north out of sight.
Man reports witnessing a gray colored "flying-wing" shaped craft flying silently overhead.  Moved at steady pace.
Group of 5 (?) people witness "shooting star" streak across sky, then stop.  Second "star" began to move. (Not all facts clear.)
Mother calls to report that her son would not go to bed "until he had drawn in detail the interior of ship" he had seen that night.
Woman repts. 2 objs., "big and small," hovering in clear sky to SW.  Lights appear to blink or strobe.  Other witnesses.
Woman, husband, police officer, & sec. guard witness 2 objs., one large & white, one smaller, red & green.  8 windows in big one!
MUFON member observes w/ binoculars "ivory-colored object, wingless" descend into trees in vicinity of FEMA facility.
Man repts. moving obj. w/ strange lights moving E to W.  Hovered below overcast (?).
Woman, neighbor see huge, bright lighted "cigar" ship w/ windows.  Drifted over farm, rose vertically. Good rept.
Woman sits outside to witness aircraft.  Sees a large "triangular-shaped obj. w/ pastel lights on edge" pass slowly overhead.
Young girl w/ friends witness bizarre "triangle w/ 3 red, dim lights," streak across sky.  Strobed bright light.  Scared, nauseous.
Man repts. multiple sightings of strangely lighted craft hovering, then streaking overhead in clear sky.  Some w/ subdued lights.
Woman repts. strange obj. w/ 3 bright red "laser-like" lights, which flickered in irregular pattern.  Called local police, FAA.
Woman repts. seeing peculiar star zigzagging across sky.  Fifth sighting in a week.
Man calls on behalf of person, who has had possible involvement w/ strange creatures.  Directed to investigators.
Group of young people witness blue-green light--"ball of fire"--streak down at angle.  4 min. later, hear 2x loud booms.  Dramatic!

Observer and husband observed an immense, intensely bright aura of light being radiated upwards from beside the highway on top of the hill just south of the Nisqually delta area.  The light was very visible, lighting up the sky and surrounding area for quite a distance, illuminating approximately 30-40 degrees (arc) of sky for about 3 seconds.  Ten seconds later, it happened again.  Then, approximnately 10 minutes later, as they were driving west on Rte. 101, they looked back to the same area and witnessed the same phenomenon. Their impression was that the light was being radiated from a solid object, that was sitting on the ground, out of sight, beside the highway. There were several other vehicles on the road at the time.  One was a truck, together with several passenger cars.
Woman & daughter see very brilliant light w/ "little lights spinning out of it."  1st obj. appears to land, 2nd arrives!  Police.
Young woman reports seeing unusual entities on beach.  Creatures were clothed in unusual garments.  (No written rept. received.)

SUMMARY:  miles to the east we saw 5 discs in a semi arc. they were the size of a dinner plate. color that of a lighter flame, yellow. the clouds parted and a large grey black object appeared. they all just disapearred. shuttle launching mission.at aprox.18 nautical5 dinner plate size discs. color of lighter flame,yellow. in a semi arc ,they just disapear. then the storm clouds seem to just roll they unfold a large grey black object. we can't make out shape.they all just puffed out. we work at gayfers dept. store  one is a seamstress,one a price scanner me a hair stylist.

Man walked out onto his front porch at 2305 hours, and saw a very bright light in the sky.  With binoculars, it looked as though it had four small lights on one end, and it was giving off sparks on the other. The object stayed in place for 3-5 minutes, at which time it suddenly moved toward the southeast at a constant velocity, disappearing from sight.

Telephoned Report:  Husband and wife were awakened at 0500 hrs. by lights in their bedroom.It was raining very hard, and there had been strong winds that night. they reported seeing a very bright, colored light about 3/4 miles from their house.  It lit up the entire area, and the light fluctuated.  They also heard a loud humming sound, and their power went off for 1 second.  Suddenly, the wind died down, and they experienced an "eerie calm."  The light came from behind the trees, and it was red, and it came through the trees. NOTE:  Michael Atkins, MUFON Field Investigator, investigated this report, and he discovered from the local fire department that an electrical transformer had exploded, or shorted out.

At 2313 hours, the caller was walking his dog and was looking to the northern sky.  Suddenly, he saw a VERY bright red light streak across the sky, parallel to the horizon, moving from east to west. The object had a very long tail on it, perhaps miles long.  It gave off an orange glow, and the front of the fireball was distinctly round, although the shape of whatever object was inside the fireball was not discernible.  It was the fastest thing he had ever seen!!  It looked like it was on fire, and was bright orange.

Caller and four other observers see a peculiar egg-shaped, orange-red light move from southeast to northwest.  Estimated altitude was 1,000-1,500 feet.  They were located at 30th and 105th Ave. in Lake Stevens when they saw it.
Man sees formation of 10-12 dimly lit amber lights in wedge-formation pass E to W overhead at VERY high speed, like shooting star.

Caller saw what she presumed to be a conventional small aircraft in the night sky.  Suddenly, it turned red in color, then blue, then yellow!!Her husband, and other train passengers witnessed it, as well.

((NUFORC Note:  This report received over the telephone from a seemingly serious-minded person.  The time and date in March 1996 are approximate.  PD))Woman called in response to her viewing a re-run of a Hard Copy program, which featured NUFORC. Sometime in mid-March 1996, the caller's husband was outside walking their dog.  He suddenly called his wife and daughter to come outside and look at some peculiar lights in the sky. The caller went outside, only to see a 7-9 foot tall dome, which was about the same dimension in width.  In addition, they saw a human-like creature in a "window" in the near side of the dome-like craft.

She was driving west of Waukesha, WI, and saw a "shooting star" descend vertically, suddenly stop its descent, then shoot "forward" and disappear.  Even though she saw it for only 2 seconds, she got a good enough look at it to believe that it had lights of some sort on it, not lights that one would expect to see on a shooting star.  Case was forwarded to Richard Thieme, MUFON SD, and I called him with a follow-up call.  He had already talked to the woman and surmised it might be a C-172 in the pattern of a local airport, but reconsidered after our talk.
News media rept. Pakistani & TWA airliners departing JFKennedy airport witness very bizarre, fast obj. in their proximity.
Woman repts. her husband had just witnessed two bizarre ships, "a round one, and a long torpedo-shaped obj.," pass overhead.

Four adults, plus children, witness five objects pass overhead at high speed, traveling from south to north.  Each object had three glowing, rotating bulbs on the bottom, and all five objects flew overhead in sequence, separated by 30-40 seconds.

See earlier entry. MO Hwy. Patrol relays report:  Over 60 calls of UFO reports made to law enforcement on the evenings of 13JA96 and 14JA96 in the vicinity of Springfield, MO, and in other parts of southwest MO.((NUFORC Note:  Our gratitude to this officer, and to the Missouri Highway Patrol, for this report.  PD))
Woman & friend witness "glowing pink, fluorescent, soup-can shaped" object in night sky.  Almost size of full moon.

He calls to report that the 9:00 o'clock news on KSHB-TV in Kansas City, MO, had reported that several individuals had reported they had seen two delta-shaped objects, with mult-colored lights, and a ball of fire trailing behind it, fly overhead. Residents called 911, and the police dispatched helicopters, although they saw nothing. Many other people saw it.

Summary Line:  "on orange ball of light  appears over the mountains projects directly over head.. disappears"It was approx. 21:00 hrs. at a strip mall.  I was out having a cigar, I looked up towards the east... Over past the metro centre from the mountains appeared a orange ball of light.. the object then  motioned towards my direction  very rapidly.  it looked like it was on fire (the back half of the sphear) had red flames,  the object made no noise yet it traveled approx 1 and  1/2 miles within seconds. (1001 1002 1000 & ....it was goin!!!) the object didn't appear to be very hi..I had a cristal clear view..

Man and wife were driving on I-45 highway at 65 mph, when they witnessed a disc-shaped object, with peculiar blinking light(s) on the bottom go streaking by in the opposite direction on the other side of the highway.  The wife, sitting in the passenger seat, could see a hatch, door, or grating in the bottom of the craft as it went by.  She turned around to view it behind their car, and noted that it had flipped up on edge after it had passed them.  It was northbound when it disappeared from their sight.
Pilot repts. 2 bizarre, large, bright red lights hovering "at 245 degrees, 45 degrees up" viewed from his home.  Faded sequentially.

He called to say that two workers at the fiber plant in Kelso, WA, had seen a cluster of 25-30 objects, the apparent size and brightness of stars, pass overhead to the north during the dark hours of Sunday, 29SE96.  The names of the observers are:  Tim Long and Eric Englebertson.  They will call. I gave Michael the name and number of Michael Dobbs, and he said he would call him.

Young woman and friend were out driving, when they spotted a bizarre, round object with intensely bright white and blue lights.  They drove after the object, turned down a road to approach it, and witnessed it on the ground beside the road with a bright flashing red light.

SUMMARY:  Had a alien possible abduction ,very hard to talk about it. Remember hearing  buzzing sound and 6 small grey figures that  passed out.I woke up at 3am and was just laying there ,when I heard this buzzing sound outside and really didn't think much about it , it keep getting louder and louder until it was in the room and I sat up in bed to see if something was wrong in the bedroom .  I was fully awake...  I just feel asleep like right away , but as I was closing my eyes I saw 6 small grey figures and felt something touch my leg and arms.  When I woke up it was 6am and I felt like I wanted to be afraid but couldn't , I have a lot of trouble understanding what happen.. The only other thing is since then I have had several nose bleeds . Which I rarely have had before.
Woman driving home from shopping sees "subdued white" disc.  Obj. suddenly ejects multi-colored sparks in a stream.

A woman calls to report that she had been on a commuter bus at 0614 hrs., when she saw a blue-green object, about 1/2 the diameter of the moon, streak from east to west to the north of her location. She was approximate 1/2 mile south of the park at Pt. No Point, when she saw the object from her seat on the but.

SUMMARY:  We saw a comet like shape heading west to east very fast, Suddenly the comet tail dissapeared, than ignited twice then disapeared.On tuesday Dec 17 at 9:00pm my friend and I were on our way home from the sawgrass mills mall. In Sunrise Fl. The highway that we were on runs north and south.To the west is all Everglades, to the east is Sunrise, Up in the sky way way west we saw a comet shaped object moving west to east in an arc shaped motion.It looked like a blueish sphere with a reddish comet-like tail.It was way too high to see any real detail. The object was moving at an incredable rate of speed. Suddenly the comet tail went out and all you could see was the blue orb. When the UFO was over the road (still way to high to see detail) the tail"fired" twice, like some kind ofafte rburners.And was rocketed out of sight to the east ina matter of seconds, way faster than anything either of us had ever seen. My friend and I know alot about airplanes and this fits no description we could make. Planes appear to be moving slowly from afar, not this thing.We have absoultly no explanation for this.It !must have traveled 50 or 60 miles in the extent of 60 to 90 seconds.Please post this so I can find out if anyone else saw it. There were plenty of other cars on the road at this time. Thanks Dan This story also appears at http://mother.com/~green3/ufo/dan.htm
Man driving S on Hwy. 215 East sees "huge falling star" descend out of night sky.  Strange, distinctly blue color.

A man was outside his home for a last smoke and to walk his dog, before going to bed. He looked at the night sky to the southwest, because that is the direction where there is no treeline, and he suddenly noticed a light, which at first he thought might be a star, although it appeared to him to be rather large to be a star. When he looked back at a a couple of minutes later, it was now larger than a full moon!  Also, it appeared to be getting closer to him, and was lower to the horizon, he thought.  Then he realized that it had become two distinct lights, both bright white.  At this point, he summoned his wife, who also saw the object as it passed directly overhead.  they both agreed it was less that 500 feet above them. It was not a helicopter, and it was too slow for an aircraft.  The two lights were on the bottom, and they were glowing.  They could see an outline of the object as it passed overhead, and it appeared to be "pie-shaped." They both heard a really low hum as the object passed overhead very slowly.  The object suddenly disappeared approximately 2 seconds after it had passed overhead.  The caller added that he and his wife have three cats, one of which is an "outside" cat, and two that are "indoor" cats.  After the incident, all of the them were gone, and they did not return until approximately one week later. Their dog, which normally is very eager to go outside, would not go outside for several days without coaxing from his owner.  The dog, a pit bull (?) was apparently very upset for several days afterward.  At 2315 hrs. that night, after the sighting, the dog started barking and snapping at the front door, and he would not go through that door for 4-5 days.

SUMMARY:   A LIGHT FOLLOWED AN AEROPLANE AND THEN THEY BOTH VANISHED.I WAS GOING DOWN THE M25.(A MOTORWAY GOING AROUND LONDON) WITH MY DAD.  I WAS GOING TO THE NEW FOREST IN HAMPSHIRE WHERE I HAVE A FLAT AS A SECOND HOME.  (MY MUM WAS GOING TO COME DON LATER).  I SAW A SHOOTING STAR AND SO DID MY DAD.  I STARTED TO LOOK FOR MORE OF THEM.  I LOOKED AT THE MOON AND UNDERNEATH IT WAS A SMALL BUT BRIGHT LIGHT.  AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS A STAR BUT THEN IT BEGAN TO DESCEND TOWARDS THE EARTH.  (THERE IS NOT A CHANCE THAT A MAN MADE OBJECT COULD FLY LIKE THIS.)  THE LIGHT PULLED UP A BIT AND THEN FOLLOWED AN AEROPLANE.  THEN I WENT BEHIND SOME TREES.  WHEN I CLEARED THE TREE'S THE AEROPLANE AND THE LIGHT HAD VANISHED.  I STILL AM NOT SURE WHAT IT WAS.

The caller had gone out onto her deck and looked up, when whe noticed two "stars" overhead, with a third "star" nearby the first two.  The third object was a "bit askew." Suddenly, the third object moved, then stopped, then moved again in a straight line.  Then it west back to approximately the point where it had, relative to the first two objects, and it moved away from them again. The caller suddenly got scared by the events, and she called her husband and son to look at the objects.  After her second summons, they came out of the house and saw it. The object(s) moved to between some trees, and stopped.  It moved again, then suddenly just winked out. She will send written report.
Man in hot tub sees 2 very bright objs. side by side streaking S to N, both suddenly stop.  Joined by 3rd obj. from NW.  Streak off.

Woman sees round, orange "globe" of light flying to W.  Wakes husband, who sees obj. briefly.  Obj. flew up valley, disappeared.((NUFORC Note:  Cars reportedly were stopped on State Route 2, along the Wenatchee River, and the occupants were out of their cars to view the multiple, large, luminous objects that flew to the east along the river.  A peculiar event was also reported from two UFO investigators in Seattle and Woodinville just seconds before the sightings in Cashmere.  PD))

Telephoned Report:  He called to relay the fact that sometime during 1982 or 1983, there was a mass sighting by many residents of the town of North Port, MI.  Many people, he reports, were standing on the beach looking west over Lake Michigan at discs over the water.  They were doing "circus acts" in the air.  The incident lasted for hours, perhaps as long as five hours.  Thousands of feet of video were taken. The incident was covered in the Traverse City Record Eagle newspaper.
Man & daughter witness triangular obj. w/ 3 very bright white lights on the corners, 1 red light in the cntr. Obj. circled their home!

column3: Cuenca (Eof, in the high Andes Mts)  (Ecuador),
column6: SUMMARY:   In auto driving thru Cajas Nat. Pk, 10,000ft/ Suddenly extremely bright light flashed across the road just a few yards high and dissaapearedIm a teacher of 38 yrs traveling with a Medical Dorctor same age as I  (surgeon). and an Ecuaddorian  Im an American . we were traveling east from Cuenca city to Guayaquill on the coast were in the middile of a very remote area hing in the Andes Mts late at night. going slowly, When a brilliant light  like silver sreak flashed in fron of the car.  the doctor was driving and yelled to me  "did you see that"?  as I to was loooking out the front wishild at the time I said hell yes. and we yelled for his con Eddie to wake up in the back seat to see, but I was gon in a "flash so to speak.  It was not hgh up in the sky  just a few 100 yrds or so  We were both frightened, As Ive see such things before a few other tiimes I thoght I had an idea of what  it was.  I said little as didnot want him to think I was nuts.  Ive learned to keep my mouth closed about such things. Having experienced a sighting as far back as 1960 in the mts of Idaho and also Wyoming in another year

The caller went outside to walk his dog and look at the comet. He looked to the east, and he noticed movement in the night sky.  Upon looking closely at the object, he noticed that it was 7-9 lights (est.), oriented in a "boomerang" shape.  The lights were orange in color, and they were very faint, fainter than typical stars, for example. The object moved very fast from the eastern sky to the northwest sky, traversing approximately 120-130 degrees (est.) of arc in approximately 5 seconds.  No sound was apparent.The caller does not have internet access.

He called following Linda Howe's "plug" for the Center on 03DE95. He was a cadet in the USAF in early JA55, and was receiving training at Ell(?) AFB (now Johnson Space Center) w/ a group of cadets.  They all witnessed a silver disc over a radome, which hovered and maneuvered for about 12 minutes. In mid-November l970, he, his wife, and his sons witnessed 2 saucers, 70-80 ft. in dia. (est.) maneuver over southern WA, or OR.
Young man witnesses bizarre cluster of red-orange lights to W of house.  Heard "whooshing" or vibration.  Obj. moved to E, turns blue.
Point of light (" star") moves incredibly fast across sky.  Witness does not believe it was shooting star due to speed and trajectory.

Woman and male friend witness very peculiar "very large, very slow" aircraft with strange disc mounted above it.  Suddenly, the disc seemed to separate from the aircraft and move ahead of it, such that the crew in the cockpit could not have failed to see the object, the caller thought. The caller and her friend thought that the aircraft had no emblem or other markings on it, and they both emphasized how unusually slowly it appeared to fly.  She and her friend both think that they have witnessed UFO's in the past.
Four teenagers on hill see immense, very bright ball of greenish-white light streak vert. down, hit ground 20 miles (?) to SW. Silent.

SUMMARY:  3 dull orange lights closely clustered traveling from NNW to SSE. Traveling at high altitude & rate of speed with a abrupt jog to the east directly above then continuing SSE.After some showers, clear evening sky to the North, high broken skies to the South East.Sitting on sixth floor veranda, nearest to the beach, lights in courtyard had been turned off.Wife and I were sky browsing when my peripheral vision picked up some rapid movement to the NorthEast. The object, which looked like 3 dull orange lights close together, moved very rapidily from10:00 to 2:00 with a slight jog to the East at 12:00. Its speed was faster than an aircraft, and had no other lights. We lost sight of this object over the clouds to the South East.The skies were crystal clear with the exception of the high clouds to the South East.I am a Director of Electronics and have been in the industry for 30+ years. Served a brief stint in the Navy flying in P5M's in the mid 60's in Vietnam.My wife is a business office manager in the hospital field for the past 25+ years.
Man & wife witness three strange lights near their rural home.  They exhibited red, green, and white light; formed a triangle.

The caller, a senior member of the military (ret./artillery), together with another observer, had witnessed a very peculiar sight in the night sky to the north of his location. The observer was located approximately 20 miles south of the NY/PA state line10 miles south of Mansfield, and 6 miles south of the intersection of U.S. Routes #15 and #6. He saw what appeared to be a commercial airliner, with normal navigation lights, flying from the northern sky to the southeast with a round, bright orange ball of light about "200 mils" (approx 7 degrees arc) in front of the aircraft!  The object was approximately "10 mils" (approx. 20 arc minutes) in diameter.The type of aircraft he witnessed was unknown to him, but he felt certain it was a commercial type a/c.  It had "blue and red lights" (sic) on it. He commented that the crew of the aircraft MUST have seen the object, which he thought was probably directly ahead of the aircraft.  The object was NOT a meteor, the observer reported.  It was moving across the sky in a methodical fashion, at a seemingly steady pace.  It was certainly not streaking.   Neither object made any noise, which struck the observer as being very strange. He did not hear any jet noise whatever, even though the object passed directly overhead of his position.

Caller first called at 2153 hrs. on Friday, 22MR96, and left a message. He was standing outside to look for the comet, when he noticed a V-shaped formation of points of light almost directly overhead.  Eadh "wing" of the "V" consisted of approximately 10 objects, each about the size of a small star.  Each side of the "V" was swept about 10 degrees behind the straight line oriented perpendicular to the line of flight of the formation. The formation had a very high angular velocity, and the observers estimate was that they were moving at a very high speed.  He stated that they looked like a formation of jet fighters, but there was no sound.  The formation was moving faster than a formation of fighters would have been moving.  The observer watched them pass through approximately 15 degrees of arc, moving from west to east--toward the lights of Houston to the east of his position--when they disappeared from his sight because of the brightness of the ambient light.

Former USAF pilot sees silver/gray disc streak up to aft end of departing UAL DC-10.  Obj. accelerates dramatically, ascend @ 45 deg.!((NUFORC Note:  We spoke with this individual, and found him to be credible.  He submitted a handwritten report, together with an illustration of the alleged event.  PD))

SUMMARY:  We saw a large "spotlight" at about 100-150 ft directly above us. It had one flashing red light above the spotlight and two white lights to each side of the object (4 total).
